DOC.brief_title: NEBIDO Symptomatic Late Onset Hypogonadism ( SLOH )
DOC.criteria: Men age 60 year old ( > 60yrs ) , untrained Symptomatic hypogonadism define ) b ) ) Total testosterone 12 nmol/l ( measurement 7.0011.00 a.m. ) b ) Total Aging Males ' symptom score 36 Willing avoid significant change pattern physical exercise lifestyle duration study Residence Cologne Area Previous assignment treatment study Use androgen therapy anabolic steroid respectively 12 month entry study ( i.e . screen visit/visit 1 ) Current participation exercise program within last 6 month Suspicion know history prostate breast cancer hormone dependent neoplasia Abnormal finding Digital Rectal Examination ( DRE ) Prostate specific antigen ( PSA ) level > 4 ng/ml History clinically significant post void residual urine ( > 150 ml ) Suspicion know history liver tumor Hypersensitivity active substance excipients NEBIDO e.g . benzylbenzoate castor oil Blood coagulation irregularity present increase risk bleed intramuscular injection include vitaminKantagonists strong anticoagulant 32 Additional Exclusion Criteria
